TLCConcept.showAs: The Farming with Nature Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2025

preface.block: In accordance with section 50 (6) (d) of the Agriculture Act 2020 a draft of these Regulations has been laid for approval and resolution by the Assembly.
DRAFT Statutory Rules of Northern Ireland

formula.name: enactingText
formula.p:
The Department of Agriculture, Environment and Rural Affairs, in exercise of the powers conferred by section 48 of, and paragraph 7 of Schedule 6 to the Agriculture Act 2020
2020 c. 21, makes the following Regulations:

content.p: These Regulations may be cited as The Farming with Nature Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2025 and shall come into operation on the day after the day on which it is affirmed by resolution of the Assembly.

the Rural Development Regulation means Regulation (EU) No. 1305/2013 of the European Parliament and of the Council on support for rural development by the European Agricultural Fund for Rural Development
EUR 1305/2013.

The Interpretation Act (Northern Ireland) 1954
1954 c. 33 shall apply to these Regulations as it applies to an Act of the Assembly.

article.heading: Amendment of the Rural Development Regulation

content.p: The Rural Development Regulation is amended in accordance with regulations 4 and 5.
Sealed with the Official Seal of the Department of Agriculture, Environment and Rural Affairs on XXXX 2025.
content.block: A senior officer of the Department of Agriculture, Environment and Rural Affairs
